title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.3 - Sale for beverage purposes prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 26.3 - Sale for beverage purposes prohibited

State Regulations

No holder of an AP permit shall knowingly sell any
alcohol for beverage purposes, or sell any of the same under circumstances from
which he might reasonably deduce the intention of the purchaser to use it for
such purposes. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
26.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
